TaxonIdentification.variety_name: 刺毛薹草 ( 原变种) ci mao tai cao (yuan bian zhong)

treatment.description: Involucral bracts setaceous. Utricles not ferruginous punctate.
treatment.distribution: Subalpine meadows in thickets; 1400–3700 m. Gansu, Guizhou, Hunan, Qinghai, Sichuan, Xizang, Yunnan [Kashmir, Nepal].
